full_summary:
## 5A251-225271 Oil and Gas Integrated Mapping and Database Software Request for Proposal

### Request Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC), is soliciting proposals for the provision, delivery, installation, configuration, maintenance, and technical support of an integrated mapping and database software for the Indigenous Oil and Gas Canada (IOGC) at Tsuut’ina, Alberta.

### Key Dates
- **Publication Date:** June 29, 2023
- **Closing Date:** Wednesday, July 26, 2023, at 14:00 EST
- **Contract Start Date:** October 5, 2023 (with an option period of two years)
- **Contract End Date:** September 30, 2028

### Requirements and Specifications
The solution must meet the following specifications:
- Data management and query software
- Data base reporting software
- Data base user interface and query software
- Data mining software
- Information retrieval or search software
- Geographic information system
- Industry-specific software
- Analytical or scientific software

### Bidding and Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Please note that this is a competitive solicitation.

### Commercial and Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to suppliers who meet the terms and conditions of the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Supplier Information

- Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
- Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
- Contact Information: Princess Unser (she/her), PSPC, shelley
